ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evls1varsrng.q | |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) |
| 2 |  | evls1varsrng.o | |- O = ( eval1 ` S ) |
| 3 |  | evls1varsrng.v | |- V = ( var1 ` U ) |
| 4 |  | evls1varsrng.u | |- U = ( S |`s R ) |
| 5 |  | evls1varsrng.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 6 |  | evls1varsrng.s | |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) |
| 7 |  | evls1varsrng.r | |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_evls1var | |- ( ph -> ( Q ` V ) = ( _I |` B ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 5 | #P_evl1fval1 | |- O = ( S evalSub1 B ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> O = ( S evalSub1 B ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( O ` V ) = ( ( S evalSub1 B ) ` V ) ) |
| 12 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> V = ( var1 ` U ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( var1 ` S ) = ( var1 ` S ) |
| 14 | 13, 7, 4 | #P_subrgvr1 | |- ( ph -> ( var1 ` S ) = ( var1 ` U ) ) |
| 15 | 5 | #P_ressid | |- ( S e. CRing -> ( S |`s B ) = S ) |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( S |`s B ) = S ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> S = ( S |`s B ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( var1 ` S ) = ( var1 ` ( S |`s B ) ) ) |
| 19 | 12, 14, 18 | #P_3eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> V = ( var1 ` ( S |`s B ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( S evalSub1 B ) ` V ) = ( ( S evalSub1 B ) ` ( var1 ` ( S |`s B ) ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S evalSub1 B ) = ( S evalSub1 B ) |
| 22 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( var1 ` ( S |`s B ) ) = ( var1 ` ( S |`s B ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S |`s B ) = ( S |`s B ) |
| 24 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( S e. CRing -> S e. Ring ) |
| 25 | 5 | #P_subrgid | |- ( S e. Ring -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 26 | 6, 24, 25 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 27 | 21, 22, 23, 5, 6, 26 | #P_evls1var | |- ( ph -> ( ( S evalSub1 B ) ` ( var1 ` ( S |`s B ) ) ) = ( _I |` B ) ) |
| 28 | 11, 20, 27 | #P_3eqtrrd | |- ( ph -> ( _I |` B ) = ( O ` V ) ) |
| 29 | 8, 28 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( Q ` V ) = ( O ` V ) ) |
